experience.title: Management Consulting Analyst
experience.description: Minimum Viable Succession Planning Strategy for a Leading Automotive Original Equipment Manufacturer◉ Defined the strategic vision for an MVP focused on succession planning, addressing leadership pipeline gaps, and ensuring organizational resilience, resulting in a 25% improvement in role transition preparedness. ◉ Conducted a thorough gap analysis to identify 10 critical at-risk roles and designed an MVP framework to reduce leadership vacancy risks by 30% through streamlined development and knowledge retention.◉ Pitched the MVP concept to key stakeholders, securing a $1.5M budget by showcasing its potential to reduce leadership transition costs by 20% and enhance workforce agility by 15%.◉ Executed the MVP by integrating real-time video guidance and scalable documentation processes, achieving a 40% reduction in troubleshooting time and a 35% increase in process consistency.◉ Established a roadmap for scaling the MVP, aligning it with long-term succession planning goals, projected to improve knowledge retention by 50% and cut training costs by 25%Strategy Consultant – Leading Cloud Service Provider◉ Developed & executed a strategic data governance framework, defining ownership and KPIs to integrate PLM and Asset Spare List updates into Maximo Enterprise Asset Management, improving data accuracy by 25% and operational efficiency by 20%.◉ Designed and led the automation strategy for data profiling, transformation, and integration, optimizing data flow between systems and reducing data processing time by 30%, enabling real-time decision-making capabilities.◉ Directed data cleansing and enrichment strategies, leveraging machine learning tools to enhance data quality, improving spare parts information accuracy by 20% and increasing reporting efficiency.◉ Managed cross-functional collaboration and change management, ensuring successful MVP execution, achieving 95% stakeholder alignment, and driving 90% adoption of new processes across business units
